name: Tomás Luis de Victoria
description:
This  is a Bitsy game made as a project for music class, to help learn a bit about the spanish musician and composer Tomás Luis de Victoria.

Just play on your internet browser, or you can download the file, unzip it and then click on the index.html file to start the game.

Please check that your browser has music enabled!!!

If you play on computer, use the arrow keys to move. If you play via phone, swipe the screen to move the character.

The song is O vos omnes, by Tomás Luis de Victoria.

You can find the Bitsy Game Maker (by Adam Le Doux) here: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

The game uses a couple of tools. First one is Pixsy by Ruin: https://ruin.itch.io/pixsy

Also, for the music we used Add Bitsy Audio, by Mark Wonnacott: https://candle.itch.io/bitsy-audio

Thank you for playing!
